languages.text: "Я солгу, если скажу, что не думала об этом. Но ты все это время помогал{mf||а} мне и моим собратьям — по мере своих сил. Разве не должна я ответить тебе тем же, элантах?"
"I would be lying if I said I had not thought about it. But you have helped me and my kin all this time to the best of your ability. Should I not repay you in kind, elantach?"
languages.original_text: "Я солгу, если скажу, что не думала об этом. Но ты все это время помогал{mf||а} мне и моим собратьям — по мере своих сил. Разве не должна я ответить тебе тем же, элантах?"

traits.locale_text: "I would be lying if I said I had not thought about it. But you were helping me and my kin this entire time to the best of your ability. Should I not repay you in kind, elantach?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would be lying if I said I had not thought about it. But you were helping me and my kin this entire time to the best of your ability. Should I not repay you in kind, elantach?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would be lying if I said I had not thought about it. But you have helped me and my kin all this time to the best of your ability. Should I not repay you in kind, elantach?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would be lying if I said I had not thought about it. But you have helped me and my kin all this time to the best of your ability. Should I not repay you in kind, elantach?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Mentiría si dijera que no me lo he planteado. Pero durante todo este tiempo nos has prestado toda la ayuda que has podido. ¿No debería yo devolverte el favor, elantach?».
languages.original_text: "I would be lying if I said I had not thought about it. But you have helped me and my kin all this time to the best of your ability. Should I not repay you in kind, elantach?"

traits.locale_text: «Mentiría si dijera que no me lo he planteado. Pero durante todo este tiempo nos has prestado toda la ayuda que has podido. ¿No debería yo devolverte el favor, elantach?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “如果我说，我从来没想过要回到我的族人身边，那我恐怕是在撒谎。不过，你一直在尽你最大的努力，帮助我和我的族人。难道我不该以德报德吗，外界人？”
languages.original_text: "I would be lying if I said I had not thought about it. But you have helped me and my kin all this time to the best of your ability. Should I not repay you in kind, elantach?"

traits.locale_text: “如果我说，我从来没想过要回到我的族人身边，那我恐怕是在撒谎。不过，你一直在尽你最大的努力，帮助我和我的族人。难道我不该以德报德吗，外界人？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je mentirais si je prétendais ne pas y avoir réfléchi, elantach, mais vous nous avez longtemps aidés du mieux que vous le pouviez, mon peuple et moi. Je dois maintenant vous rendre la pareille, ne croyez-vous pas ? »
languages.original_text: "I would be lying if I said I had not thought about it. But you have helped me and my kin all this time to the best of your ability. Should I not repay you in kind, elantach?"

traits.locale_text: « Je mentirais si je prétendais ne pas y avoir réfléchi, elantach, mais vous nous avez longtemps aidés du mieux que vous le pouviez, mon peuple et moi. Je dois maintenant vous rendre la pareille, ne croyez-vous pas ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「考えていなかったと言えば嘘になる。なんせ、あなたは、ずっと私と私の血族を助けてくれた。エランタ、お返しはしなくていいのか？」
languages.original_text: "I would be lying if I said I had not thought about it. But you have helped me and my kin all this time to the best of your ability. Should I not repay you in kind, elantach?"

traits.locale_text: 「考えていなかったと言えば嘘になる。なんせ、あなたは、ずっと私と私の血族を助けてくれた。エランタ、お返しはしなくていいのか？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Es wäre gelogen, wenn ich sage, dass ich nicht darüber nachgedacht habe. Doch Ihr habt mir und meinem Volk die ganze Zeit über geholfen, so gut Ihr es konntet. Sollte ich mich nicht revanchieren, Elantach?"
languages.original_text: "I would be lying if I said I had not thought about it. But you have helped me and my kin all this time to the best of your ability. Should I not repay you in kind, elantach?"

traits.locale_text: "Es wäre gelogen, wenn ich sage, dass ich nicht darüber nachgedacht habe. Doch Ihr habt mir und meinem Volk die ganze Zeit über geholfen, so gut Ihr es konntet. Sollte ich mich nicht revanchieren, Elantach?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Bunu aklımdan geçirmemiştim desem yalan söylemiş olurum. Ancak bunca zaman bana ve soydaşlarıma elinden geldiğince yardım ettin. Bu iyiliğinin karşılığını vermem gerekmez mi elantach?"
languages.original_text: "I would be lying if I said I had not thought about it. But you have helped me and my kin all this time to the best of your ability. Should I not repay you in kind, elantach?"

traits.locale_text: "Bunu aklımdan geçirmemiştim, dersem yalan söylemiş sayılırım. Ancak bunca zaman bana ve soydaşlarıma elinden geldiğince yardım ettin. Bu iyiliğinin karşılığını vermem gerekmez mi elantach?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
